name: Evil AI
description: The story involves a sentient artificial intelligence turning against humanity

name: Evil Twin
description: The antagonist is the protagonist's evil twin

name: Arch Enemy
description: The antagonist is the arch nemesis of the protagonist, their greatest enemy

name: Likeable Villain
description: The antagonist is entertaining, charming or sympathetic

name: Ancient Evil
description: The antagonist is an evil force from the distant past

name: Aliens
description: The antagonist is extraterrestrial

name: Creepy Doll
description: The antagonist is a creepy possessed doll

name: Devil Complex
description: The antagonist claims to be the embodiment of evil

name: Super Villain

description: The antagonist is a beautiful yet scheming woman who knows how to exploit her good looks against gullible men

name: Hidden Villain
description: The antagonist is not revealed until the end of the story

name: The Mastermind
description: The antagonist is highly intelligent

name: Heartbroken Villain

name: The Monster
description: The antagonist is a supernatural monster

name: Resurrected Evil
